<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Set TargetOptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note: This operation will overwrite any previously configured options,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// including EmulatedTLS and UseInitArray which the JITTargetMachineBuilder</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// sets by default. Clients are responsible for re-enabling these overwritten</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// options.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder/#a6a49f02d0a565e36e9814dabec0a500d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder/#ad180fd040a0603fdebcc1b4cb8b002da">JITTargetMachineBuilder</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jittargetmachinebuilder/#a6a49f02d0a565e36e9814dabec0a500d">setOptions</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">TargetOptions</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    this-&gt;Options = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/lib/debuginfo/logicalview/core/lvoptions-cpp/#ab4088b7a11f3cbc38ac16a6e9c72494e">Options</a>);</span></CodeLine>
